cli.description: Sugar kitchen application that allows you to develop quickly and efficiently

new.description: Create a new project from a recipe (template) like the default one or for example the litElement one, etc...

action.description: Exec an action of the kitchen application into the current working directory

recipe.description: Exec a recipe of the kitchen application into the current working directory

list.description: List either all the recipes available or particular recipe actions stack

add.description: Add some ingredient(s) to your project like "frontspec", "favicon", etc...
